Title.evidence: In this prospective, double-blind, randomized controlled trial

Trial_Design.evidence: In this prospective, double-blind, randomized controlled trial, 64 patients

Participants.evidence: 64 patients requiring IONM during cervical spine surgery

Intervention.evidence: administered either propofol (Group P) or remimazolam (Group R)

Objective.evidence: Here, we compared the effects of propofol and remimazolam along with remifentanil on IONM during TIVA.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the between-group difference in the N20 latency changes measured at T1 and preoperatively.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The change in SEP latencies including N20 and P37 at T1 compared with preoperative time was not significantly different between Groups P and R.
